name: ss-ticket
effect: Allows passage on a ferry. The same item is used for different ferries between different games.
short_effect: Ticket for a ship. (RSE: S.S. Tidal LF: S.S. Anne HG: S.S. Aqua)

flavor_text.black_white: The ticket required for sailing on the ferry S.S. Aqua. It has a drawing of a ship on it.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The ticket required for sailing on the ferry S.S. Aqua. It has a drawing of a ship on it.
